queryMap.query:
WITH CASH AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD IN ('00101','00303') AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '01' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00103' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '98' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00301' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '99' ELSE T.COMM_NO END AS COMM_NO, SUM(AMOUNT8) * 100 CASH_AMOUNT, SUM(COUNT8) CASH_COUNT FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, -- 경주일 정보 VW_PC_SELLST_GSUM T -- 구간별 매출액 WHERE 1=1 AND T.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND T.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND T.TMS=V.TMS AND T.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD AND T.GREEN_YN = 'N' AND V.RACE_DAY >= ? -- 기간 시작일 AND V.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 기간 종료일 AND V.MEET_CD = NVL(?, V.MEET_CD) -- 구분 코드 AND T.COMM_NO = NVL(?, T.COMM_NO) -- 지점 코드 GROUP BY CASE WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD IN ('00101','00303') AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '01' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00103' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '98' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00301' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '99' ELSE T.COMM_NO END ), GREENCARD AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD IN ('00101','00303') AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '01' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00103' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '98' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00301' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '99' ELSE T.COMM_NO END AS COMM_NO, SUM(AMOUNT8) * 100 GREENCARD_AMOUNT, SUM(COUNT8) GREENCARD_COUNT FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, -- 경주일 정보 VW_PC_SELLST_GSUM T -- 구간별 매출액 WHERE 1=1 AND T.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND T.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND T.TMS=V.TMS AND T.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD AND T.GREEN_YN = 'Y' AND V.RACE_DAY >= ? -- 기간 시작일 AND V.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 기간 종료일 AND V.MEET_CD = NVL(?, V.MEET_CD) -- 구분 코드 AND T.COMM_NO = NVL(?, T.COMM_NO) -- 지점 코드 GROUP BY CASE WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD IN ('00101','00303') AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '01' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00103' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '98' WHEN T.MEET_CD||SELL_CD = '00301' AND T.COMM_NO < 10 THEN '99' ELSE T.COMM_NO END ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '발매건당 평균 배팅액' AS GUBUN, CS.COMM_NO, CS.CASH_AMOUNT, CS.CASH_COUNT, GC.GREENCARD_AMOUNT, GC.GREENCARD_COUNT, ROUND(CS.CASH_AMOUNT / CS.CASH_COUNT,0) AS CASH_AVG_AMT, ROUND(GC.GREENCARD_AMOUNT / GC.GREENCARD_COUNT,0) AS GREENCARD_AVG_AMT, ROUND((CS.CASH_AMOUNT + GC.GREENCARD_AMOUNT) / (CS.CASH_COUNT + GC.GREENCARD_COUNT),0) AS SUM_AVG_AMT FROM CASH CS, GREENCARD GC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CS.COMM_NO = GC.COMM_NO
UNION ALL
SELECT '합계' AS GUBUN, '999' AS COMM_NO, T.CASH_AMOUNT, T.CASH_COUNT, T.GREENCARD_AMOUNT, T.GREENCARD_COUNT, ROUND(T.CASH_AMOUNT / T.CASH_COUNT,0) AS CASH_AVG_AMT, ROUND(T.GREENCARD_AMOUNT / T.GREENCARD_COUNT,0) AS GREENCARD_AVG_AMT, ROUND((T.CASH_AMOUNT + T.GREENCARD_AMOUNT) / (T.CASH_COUNT + T.GREENCARD_COUNT),0) AS SUM_AVG_AMT FROM ( SELECT SUM(CS.CASH_AMOUNT) AS CASH_AMOUNT, SUM(CS.CASH_COUNT) AS CASH_COUNT, SUM(GC.GREENCARD_AMOUNT) AS GREENCARD_AMOUNT, SUM(GC.GREENCARD_COUNT) AS GREENCARD_COUNT FROM CASH CS, GREENCARD GC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CS.COMM_NO = GC.COMM_NO )T ) WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY COMM_NO

SELECT '현금' AS GUBUN, (SUM(AMOUNT1)*100) AMOUNT1, -- 현금 금액 100~10,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT1)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE1, -- 현금 비율 100~10,000 (SUM(AMOUNT2)*100) AMOUNT2, -- 현금 금액 10,100~20,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT2)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE2, -- 현금 비율 10,100~20,000 (SUM(AMOUNT3)*100) AMOUNT3, -- 현금 금액 20,100~49,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT3)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE3, -- 현금 비율 20,100~49,900 (SUM(AMOUNT4)*100) AMOUNT4, -- 현금 금액 50,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT4)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE4, -- 현금 비율 50,000 (SUM(AMOUNT5)*100) AMOUNT5, -- 현금 금액 50,100~80,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT5)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE5, -- 현금 비율 50,100~80,000 (SUM(AMOUNT6)*100) AMOUNT6, -- 현금 금액 80,100~99,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT6)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE6, -- 현금 비율 80,100~99,900 (SUM(AMOUNT7)*100) AMOUNT7, -- 현금 금액 100,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT7)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE7, -- 현금 비율 100,000 (SUM(AMOUNT8)*100) AMOUNT8, SUM(COUNT8) COUNT8 FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, -- 경주일 정보 VW_PC_SELLST_GSUM T -- 구간별 매출액 WHERE 1=1 AND T.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND T.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND T.TMS=V.TMS AND T.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD AND T.GREEN_YN = 'N' AND T.SELL_CD IN ('01', '03') AND V.RACE_DAY >= ? -- 기간 시작일 AND V.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 기간 종료일 AND V.MEET_CD = NVL(?, V.MEET_CD) -- 구분 코드 AND T.COMM_NO = NVL(?, T.COMM_NO) -- 지점 코드
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(AMOUNT1,0) AMOUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(AMOUNT2,0) AMOUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(AMOUNT3,0) AMOUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(AMOUNT4,0) AMOUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(AMOUNT5,0) AMOUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(AMOUNT6,0) AMOUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(AMOUNT7,0) AMOUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(AMOUNT8,0) AMOUNT8, NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '전자카드' GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT <= 99900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT1, -- 금액 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 100000 AND TF.AMT <= 199900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT2, -- 금액 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 200000 AND TF.AMT <= 499900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT3, -- 금액 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT = 500000 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT4, -- 금액 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 500100 AND TF.AMT <= 799900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT5, -- 금액 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 800000 AND TF.AMT <= 999900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT6, -- 금액 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 1000000 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT7, -- 금액 100,000 SUM(TF.AMT) AS AMOUNT8, SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT <= 99900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 100000 AND TF.AMT <= 199900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 200000 AND TF.AMT <= 499900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT = 500000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 500100 AND TF.AMT <= 799900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 800000 AND TF.AMT <= 999900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 1000000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(TF.NUM) AS COUNT8 FROM TBJI_PC_TELMP_FIXEDSEAT TF, VW_SDL_INFO VS WHERE 1 = 1 AND VS.RACE_DAY = TF.RACE_DAY AND TF.GRN_ZN_CD IN ('002','003') AND TF.WIN_TYPE = '14' AND TF.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND VS.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND VS.MEET_CD = NVL(?, VS.MEET_CD) AND TF.COMM_NO = NVL(DECODE(?, '01', '00', ?), TF.COMM_NO) )
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(AMOUNT1,0) AMOUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(AMOUNT2,0) AMOUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(AMOUNT3,0) AMOUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(AMOUNT4,0) AMOUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(AMOUNT5,0) AMOUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(AMOUNT6,0) AMOUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(AMOUNT7,0) AMOUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(AMOUNT8,0) AMOUNT8, NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '모바일' AS GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT <= 99900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT1, -- 금액 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 100000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 199900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT2, -- 금액 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 200000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 499900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT3, -- 금액 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT = 500000 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT4, -- 금액 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 500100 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 799900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT5, -- 금액 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 800000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 999900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT6, -- 금액 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 1000000 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT7, -- 금액 100,000 SUM(DEV_SALES_AMT) AMOUNT8, SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT <= 99900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 100000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 199900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 200000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 499900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT = 500000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 500100 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 799900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 800000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 999900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 1000000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(DEV_SALES_CNT) COUNT8 FROM TBRS_MYCAT_TELMP TM, VW_SDL_INFO T6 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T6.RACE_DAY = TM.RACE_DAY AND TM.CHNL_CD = '002' AND TM.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND T6.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND TM.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TM.MEET_CD = NVL(?, TM.MEET_CD) AND COMM_NO = NVL(?, COMM_NO) )

SELECT '현금' AS GUBUN, (SUM(COUNT1)) COUNT1, -- 현금 건수 100~10,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT1)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE1, -- 현금 비율 100~10,000 (SUM(COUNT2)) COUNT2, -- 현금 건수 10,100~20,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT2)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE2, -- 현금 비율 10,100~20,000 (SUM(COUNT3)) COUNT3, -- 현금 건수 20,100~49,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT3)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE3, -- 현금 비율 20,100~49,900 (SUM(COUNT4)) COUNT4, -- 현금 건수 50,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT4)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE4, -- 현금 비율 50,000 (SUM(COUNT5)) COUNT5, -- 현금 건수 50,100~80,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT5)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE5, -- 현금 비율 50,100~80,000 (SUM(COUNT6)) COUNT6, -- 현금 건수 80,100~99,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT6)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE6, -- 현금 비율 80,100~99,900 (SUM(COUNT7)) COUNT7, -- 현금 건수 100,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT7)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE7, -- 현금 비율 100,000 (SUM(COUNT8)) COUNT8 FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, -- 경주일 정보 VW_PC_SELLST_GSUM T -- 구간별 매출액 WHERE 1=1 AND T.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND T.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND T.TMS=V.TMS AND T.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD AND T.GREEN_YN = 'N' AND T.SELL_CD IN ('01', '03') AND V.RACE_DAY >= ? -- 기간 시작일 AND V.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 기간 종료일 AND V.MEET_CD = NVL(?, V.MEET_CD) -- 구분 코드 AND T.COMM_NO = NVL(?, T.COMM_NO) -- 지점 코드
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(COUNT1,0) COUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(COUNT2,0) COUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(COUNT3,0) COUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(COUNT4,0) COUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(COUNT5,0) COUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(COUNT6,0) COUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(COUNT7,0) COUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '전자카드' GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT <= 99900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 100000 AND TF.AMT <= 199900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 200000 AND TF.AMT <= 499900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT = 500000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 500100 AND TF.AMT <= 799900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 800000 AND TF.AMT <= 999900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 1000000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(TF.NUM) AS COUNT8 FROM TBJI_PC_TELMP_FIXEDSEAT TF, VW_SDL_INFO VS WHERE 1 = 1 AND VS.RACE_DAY = TF.RACE_DAY AND TF.GRN_ZN_CD IN ('002','003') AND TF.WIN_TYPE = '14' AND TF.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND VS.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND VS.MEET_CD = NVL(?, VS.MEET_CD) AND TF.COMM_NO = NVL(DECODE(?, '01', '00', ?), TF.COMM_NO) )
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(COUNT1,0) COUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(COUNT2,0) COUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(COUNT3,0) COUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(COUNT4,0) COUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(COUNT5,0) COUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(COUNT6,0) COUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(COUNT7,0) COUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '모바일' AS GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT <= 99900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 100000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 199900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 200000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 499900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT = 500000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 500100 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 799900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 800000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 999900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 1000000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(DEV_SALES_CNT) COUNT8 FROM TBRS_MYCAT_TELMP TM, VW_SDL_INFO T6 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T6.RACE_DAY = TM.RACE_DAY AND TM.CHNL_CD = '002' AND TM.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND T6.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND TM.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TM.MEET_CD = NVL(?, TM.MEET_CD) AND COMM_NO = NVL(?, COMM_NO) )

SELECT '현금' AS GUBUN, (SUM(AMOUNT1)*100) AMOUNT1, -- 현금 금액 100~10,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT1)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE1, -- 현금 비율 100~10,000 (SUM(AMOUNT2)*100) AMOUNT2, -- 현금 금액 10,100~20,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT2)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE2, -- 현금 비율 10,100~20,000 (SUM(AMOUNT3)*100) AMOUNT3, -- 현금 금액 20,100~49,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT3)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE3, -- 현금 비율 20,100~49,900 (SUM(AMOUNT4)*100) AMOUNT4, -- 현금 금액 50,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT4)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE4, -- 현금 비율 50,000 (SUM(AMOUNT5)*100) AMOUNT5, -- 현금 금액 50,100~80,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT5)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE5, -- 현금 비율 50,100~80,000 (SUM(AMOUNT6)*100) AMOUNT6, -- 현금 금액 80,100~99,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT6)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE6, -- 현금 비율 80,100~99,900 (SUM(AMOUNT7)*100) AMOUNT7, -- 현금 금액 100,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT7)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) AMOUNT_RATE7, -- 현금 비율 100,000 (SUM(AMOUNT8)*100) AMOUNT8, SUM(COUNT8) COUNT8 FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, -- 경주일 정보 VW_PC_SELLST_GSUM T -- 구간별 매출액 WHERE 1=1 AND T.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND T.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND T.TMS=V.TMS AND T.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD AND T.GREEN_YN = 'N' AND T.SELL_CD IN ('01', '03') AND V.RACE_DAY >= ? -- 기간 시작일 AND V.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 기간 종료일 AND V.MEET_CD = NVL(?, V.MEET_CD) -- 구분 코드 AND T.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08')
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(AMOUNT1,0) AMOUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(AMOUNT2,0) AMOUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(AMOUNT3,0) AMOUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(AMOUNT4,0) AMOUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(AMOUNT5,0) AMOUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(AMOUNT6,0) AMOUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(AMOUNT7,0) AMOUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(AMOUNT8,0) AMOUNT8, NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '전자카드' GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT <= 99900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT1, -- 금액 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 100000 AND TF.AMT <= 199900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT2, -- 금액 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 200000 AND TF.AMT <= 499900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT3, -- 금액 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT = 500000 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT4, -- 금액 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 500100 AND TF.AMT <= 799900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT5, -- 금액 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 800000 AND TF.AMT <= 999900 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT6, -- 금액 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 1000000 THEN TF.AMT END) AMOUNT7, -- 금액 100,000 SUM(TF.AMT) AS AMOUNT8, SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT <= 99900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 100000 AND TF.AMT <= 199900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 200000 AND TF.AMT <= 499900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT = 500000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 500100 AND TF.AMT <= 799900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 800000 AND TF.AMT <= 999900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 1000000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(TF.NUM) AS COUNT8 FROM TBJI_PC_TELMP_FIXEDSEAT TF, VW_SDL_INFO VS WHERE 1 = 1 AND VS.RACE_DAY = TF.RACE_DAY AND TF.GRN_ZN_CD IN ('002','003') AND TF.WIN_TYPE = '14' AND TF.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND VS.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND VS.MEET_CD = NVL(?, VS.MEET_CD) AND TF.COMM_NO = NVL(DECODE(?, '01', '00', ?), TF.COMM_NO) )
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(AMOUNT1,0) AMOUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(AMOUNT2,0) AMOUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(AMOUNT3,0) AMOUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(AMOUNT4,0) AMOUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(AMOUNT5,0) AMOUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(AMOUNT6,0) AMOUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(AMOUNT7,0) AMOUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) AMOUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(AMOUNT8,0) AMOUNT8, NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '모바일' AS GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT <= 99900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT1, -- 금액 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 100000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 199900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT2, -- 금액 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 200000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 499900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT3, -- 금액 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT = 500000 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT4, -- 금액 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 500100 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 799900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT5, -- 금액 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 800000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 999900 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT6, -- 금액 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 1000000 THEN DEV_SALES_AMT END) AMOUNT7, -- 금액 100,000 SUM(DEV_SALES_AMT) AMOUNT8, SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT <= 99900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 100000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 199900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 200000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 499900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT = 500000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 500100 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 799900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 800000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 999900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 1000000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(DEV_SALES_CNT) COUNT8 FROM TBRS_MYCAT_TELMP TM, VW_SDL_INFO T6 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T6.RACE_DAY = TM.RACE_DAY AND TM.CHNL_CD = '002' AND TM.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND T6.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND TM.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TM.MEET_CD = NVL(?, TM.MEET_CD) AND COMM_NO = NVL(?, COMM_NO) )

SELECT '현금' AS GUBUN, (SUM(COUNT1)) COUNT1, -- 현금 건수 100~10,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT1)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE1, -- 현금 비율 100~10,000 (SUM(COUNT2)) COUNT2, -- 현금 건수 10,100~20,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT2)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE2, -- 현금 비율 10,100~20,000 (SUM(COUNT3)) COUNT3, -- 현금 건수 20,100~49,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT3)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE3, -- 현금 비율 20,100~49,900 (SUM(COUNT4)) COUNT4, -- 현금 건수 50,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT4)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE4, -- 현금 비율 50,000 (SUM(COUNT5)) COUNT5, -- 현금 건수 50,100~80,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT5)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE5, -- 현금 비율 50,100~80,000 (SUM(COUNT6)) COUNT6, -- 현금 건수 80,100~99,900 ROUND(SUM(COUNT6)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE6, -- 현금 비율 80,100~99,900 (SUM(COUNT7)) COUNT7, -- 현금 건수 100,000 ROUND(SUM(COUNT7)/SUM(COUNT8)*100,2) COUNT_RATE7, -- 현금 비율 100,000 (SUM(COUNT8)) COUNT8 FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, -- 경주일 정보 VW_PC_SELLST_GSUM T -- 구간별 매출액 WHERE 1=1 AND T.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND T.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND T.TMS=V.TMS AND T.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD AND T.GREEN_YN = 'N' AND T.SELL_CD IN ('01', '03') AND V.RACE_DAY >= ? -- 기간 시작일 AND V.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 기간 종료일 AND V.MEET_CD = NVL(?, V.MEET_CD) -- 구분 코드 AND T.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08')
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(COUNT1,0) COUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(COUNT2,0) COUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(COUNT3,0) COUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(COUNT4,0) COUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(COUNT5,0) COUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(COUNT6,0) COUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(COUNT7,0) COUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '전자카드' GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT <= 99900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 100000 AND TF.AMT <= 199900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 200000 AND TF.AMT <= 499900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT = 500000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 500100 AND TF.AMT <= 799900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 800000 AND TF.AMT <= 999900 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN TF.AMT >= 1000000 THEN TF.NUM END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(TF.NUM) AS COUNT8 FROM TBJI_PC_TELMP_FIXEDSEAT TF, VW_SDL_INFO VS WHERE 1 = 1 AND VS.RACE_DAY = TF.RACE_DAY AND TF.GRN_ZN_CD IN ('002','003') AND TF.WIN_TYPE = '14' AND TF.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND VS.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND VS.MEET_CD = NVL(?, VS.MEET_CD) AND TF.COMM_NO = NVL(DECODE(?, '01', '00', ?), TF.COMM_NO) )
UNION ALL
SELECT GUBUN, NVL(COUNT1,0) COUNT1, NVL(ROUND(COUNT1 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE1, -- 비율 100~10,000 NVL(COUNT2,0) COUNT2, NVL(ROUND(COUNT2 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE2, -- 비율 10,100~20,000 NVL(COUNT3,0) COUNT3, NVL(ROUND(COUNT3 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE3, -- 비율 20,100~49,900 NVL(COUNT4,0) COUNT4, NVL(ROUND(COUNT4 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE4, -- 비율 50,000 NVL(COUNT5,0) COUNT5, NVL(ROUND(COUNT5 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE5, -- 비율 50,100~80,000 NVL(COUNT6,0) COUNT6, NVL(ROUND(COUNT6 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE6, -- 비율 80,100~99,900 NVL(COUNT7,0) COUNT7, NVL(ROUND(COUNT7 / COUNT8 * 100,2),0) COUNT_RATE7, -- 비율 100,000 NVL(COUNT8,0) COUNT8 FROM ( SELECT '모바일' AS GUBUN, SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT <= 99900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT1, -- 건수 100~10,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 100000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 199900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT2, -- 건수 10,100~20,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 200000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 499900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT3, -- 건수 20,100~49,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT = 500000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT4, -- 건수 50,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 500100 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 799900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT5, -- 건수 50,100~80,000 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 800000 AND DEV_SALES_AMT <= 999900 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT6, -- 건수 80,100~99,900 SUM(CASE WHEN DEV_SALES_AMT >= 1000000 THEN DEV_SALES_CNT END) COUNT7, -- 건수 100,000 SUM(DEV_SALES_CNT) COUNT8 FROM TBRS_MYCAT_TELMP TM, VW_SDL_INFO T6 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T6.RACE_DAY = TM.RACE_DAY AND TM.CHNL_CD = '002' AND TM.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND T6.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND TM.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TM.MEET_CD = NVL(?, TM.MEET_CD) AND COMM_NO = NVL(?, COMM_NO) )
